WorkItem.ClosedComment: We haven't heard back on this and can't repro.  Please re-file if you still encounter this.
WorkItem.Description:
Attempting to use the UnityBootstrapper, but 'ConfigureContainer()' fails when calling the base.ConfigureContainer(), with a TypeLoadException when trying to load Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Regions.IRegionNavigationContentLoader.
Â 
If I view Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Regions in the ObjectBrowser, I see IRegionNavigationContentLoader (as I should).  But, IRegsionNavigationContentLoader is not displayed in the intelliisense context menu when viewing the types in the Regions namespace.  For that matter, neither is RegionNavigationContentLoader.  Where did it go? Has anyone else encountered this?

Comments.Message:
I tried this with Drop 9 by creating a WPF app with Unity and couldn't reproduce this issue.  Can you see if it happens with Drop 9 and, if so, give us some more detail about the type of app (WPF/Silverlight) and what your bootstrapper may have in it.

Thanks,

b
